properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT NO_NO , NO_TITLE , MEM_ID , NO_COUNT , NO_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE N JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (NO_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE N.NO_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NO_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NO_NO , NO_TITLE , NO_WRITER , NO_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
